Name: Fountainhead Island
Description: Swiftly growing vegetation keeps a thick forest wrapped around variably ancient ruins. Even the yet to be plundered ones are heavily scarred with crowbar marks.

DefaultEvent.Name: The Vault of the First Emperor
DefaultEvent.Description: It stretches through the forest in a mix of stone and wood, its style at the mercy of the Pentecost apes' current whimsies and inspirations. It would take a dedicated team to break in and uncover its secrets. Perhaps you will bring one here later...

ChildBranches.Name: A temple in the forest
ChildBranches.Description: In a clearing of parasynthetic trees looms an imposing structure of wood and stone.

DefaultEvent.Name: An investigation for another day
DefaultEvent.Description: Perhaps there is someone in Fallen London who might be able to help you get to the treasures of this island.

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the boat
ChildBranches.Description: It will take a better equipped expedition to uncover this island's secrets and treasures.

DefaultEvent.Name: Through the forest
DefaultEvent.Description: The foliage is thick and unforgiving.

ChildBranches.Name: Visit the Delightful Adventuress' camp
ChildBranches.Description: With a small army of monkeys bought with her soul, she excavates the Vault of the First Emperor.

DefaultEvent.Name: The route is familiar
DefaultEvent.Description: Soon enough, you stand before the stone gates and wooden towers of the Empire's most gloriously overconstructed structure.

ChildBranches.Name: To the Vault of the First Emperor
ChildBranches.Description: A shortcut past the Delightful Adventuress' camp

DefaultEvent.Name: Into the Valley
DefaultEvent.Description: The map of the island shows where to begin. The instructions on the back explain the rest. [You only have time for one dig attempt per visit. Every time you return to the Valley, you will begin at the correct point for finding the treasure]

ChildBranches.Name: A Treasure Hunt
ChildBranches.Description: Secrets are buried here, ready to be uncovered.

DefaultEvent.Name: An easy journey back to port
DefaultEvent.Description: The zee is calm. So is whatever might be swimming in it around here.

ChildBranches.Name: Return to the boat
ChildBranches.Description: Treasure hunting can wait until later.
